snippet: Over three dozen states have at least one insurer offering individual plans outside the government exchanges, but they aren’t eligible for financial help.
lead_paragraph: Over three dozen states have at least one insurer offering individual plans outside the government exchanges, but they aren’t eligible for financial help.

headline.main: Looking Outside the Government Box for Suitable Health Coverage
